text:
Hi everyone,

I want to ask how to get the properties of an object (Deal or Contact). Not only the default ones but also the ones that are created from the user.

Scenario:

The user selects the deal or contact.
We get the ID.
We pass the ID to our function to call an API that will deliver all the properties of the Object(Deal or Contact).
We get the properties and save them as they are for analysis.

Questions:

What API endpoint is responsible for the properties of the Object?
Are the API separated into more than one API's? So in the case to get them I need to call more than one API to get the properties?

Thank you in advance :)
Hello Alex, `/crm/v3/schemas/{object}`  is the one you need if you want to view all the properties of an object.

Just to clarify if this is the right thing.

I have this Deal, I want to get the inputs from the About this deal, and from Notes. And also in the future write into them.
Yes, you can use it for Deals and Notes.

Hi everyone,
I want to ask how to get the messages when I received a NEW_MESSAGE event from the webhook.
In the event structure, there are messageID and objectID. How to get message from this information?
